The Linum Tirinum is plant located in the resource rooms of The Gauntlet. It is used to pick linum tirinum from within The Gauntlet. Three linum tirinum can be collected from each Linum Tirinum plant.

The '''Linum Tirinum''' is plant located in the resource rooms of [[The Gauntlet]]. It is used to pick [[linum tirinum]] from within The Gauntlet. Three linum tirinum can be collected from each Linum Tirinum plant.
